page.title: 01Introducing Barrhead
page.content: { Barrhead}town covers an area of 2.66 square kilometres and has a population of approximately 18,500 people.It is within easy commuting distance of both Paisley and Glasgow with bus routes to both places and a rail link with Glasgow. There are six primary and two secondary{schools}in the town.Nursery education is also available for pre school children. There are eight{churches}which cater for the different denominations of the Christian faith.At present no other major religion has a place of worship in the town. Two fairly recent additions to Barrhead are the Sports Centre and the Health Centre.Both of these are used extensively by the local population.
